## Events

| Event                       | Description                                   | Type               |
| --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `table:table-cell-click`    | Emitted when a cell is clicked.               | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `table:table-page`          | Emitted when pagination is changed.           | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `table:table-select-change` | Emitted when the selection changes.           | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `table:table-sort`          | Emitted when sorting is applied to the table. | `CustomEvent<any>` |
